mapper.insert: INSERT INTO laboratory (name, buildingNo, createTime, isAppointment,updateTime) VALUES (#{name} ,#{buildingNo} ,#{createTime} ,#{isAppointment},#{updateTime} )
mapper.update: update laboratory set name = #{name} ,buildingNo = #{buildingNo} ,isAppointment = #{isAppointment},updateTime = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_laboratory (code, userId, laboratoryId, appointTime, returnTime, overdueTime, auditId, state, createTime) VALUES (#{code} ,#{userId} ,#{laboratoryId} ,#{appointTime} ,#{returnTime} ,#{overdueTime} ,#{auditId} ,#{state} ,#{createTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user_laboratory set returnTime = #{returnTime} ,overdueTime = #{overdueTime} ,auditId = #{auditId} ,state = #{state} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select ul.*,l.*,au.name auditName from user_laboratory ul LEFT join user u on u.id = ul.userId LEFT join user au on au.id = ul.auditId LEFT join laboratory l on l.id = ul.laboratoryId where u.id = #{userId}
